title: Please help me identify this logo-font (script)
content:
Dear type-experts,  
please help me identifying this handwritten font.

Is it based on an existing type, or do you think it is completely  
handmade...?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161251im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4605.jpg)

Thank you very much for your help!!  
Michael

Font: 

 Justlefthand 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161251/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Carpio

comments.content:
Perfect,  
thank you so much!

Michael

Hey,  
and one last question: How do I post a thumb left to my posting?

Thank you
